name: Aging/Ageless
desc: This item causes its user to age quickly, or slow or cease aging.

name: Alive
desc: This item moves about on its own when not in use. It might mysteriously reappear in its user's possession if they lose or discard it.

name: Attracting
desc: This item tends to attract certain types of animals or supernatural creatures.

name: Bound Creature
desc: This item contains a supernatural creature that powers its abilities. It may be resting in the item to recover, imprisoned in the item against its will, or haunting the item. If it gets out of the item, it might be grateful for the user's help, or attack them in a rage.

name: Ceremonial
desc: This item was created to be used in a special magical ritual.

name: Contact
desc: This item allows its user to contact some powerful entity (most likely the item's creator)- or for the entity to contact them.

name: Coveted
desc: This item is highly sought after. Others may offer to buy the item from its user at a high price, or more likely attempt to kill them and take it.

name: Cursed
desc: This item has a curse placed on it that causes its wielder some negative effect. It might also make it difficult for its user to get rid of it.

name: Damaged
desc: This item is a broken shadow of its former self. It may be possible to repair it.

name: Difficult
desc: This item is poisonous, acidic, spiked, extremely hot or cold, or some other trait that makes it difficult or impossible to use without special gear or magic.

name: Emotional
desc: This item enhances or suppresses the emotions of its user.

name: Esoteric
desc: This item has secret properties that can be unlocked, though doing so will prove difficult.

name: Exhausting
desc: The user of this item risks becoming exhausted, diseased, or injured when they use it.

name: Haunted
desc: The spirit of this item's creator, one of its former users, or a victim still lingers around it, and will not depart until its purpose has been fulfilled.

name: Hidden Secret
desc: This item contains a hidden message or other secret that only appears under certain conditions.

name: Historic
desc: This item was used to perform a deed of great goodness or great evil. Many people will recognize it and react accordingly.

name: Hungry
desc: This item requires "food" of some kind (most likely blood), and will not function if not fed.

name: Key
desc: This item is the key to a lock or portal sealed with powerful magic.

name: Life-granter/Life-stealer
desc: Small life forms such as grass, flowers, or insects grow or wither in this item's presence.

name: Lost
desc: This item bears some special significance to a person or group, who have lost it and would like to see it returned.

name: Madness
desc: The user of this item risks going mad.

name: Manipulative
desc: This item will try to drive its user to commit certain acts, or prevent them from committing such acts (for instance, acts of good or evil).

name: Mark
desc: When used, this item leaves a visible and recognizable mark on its target or the surrounding terrain.

name: Memories
desc: This item contains fragments of memory from its creator or previous user(s). While using it, attuned to it, or sleeping near it, its user might be able to access these memories, or they might see them in brief flashes.

name: Musical
desc: When used, this item plays a song or song fragment.

name: Mysterious
desc: This item has a mysterious and unknown history. It contains some clue to its background, such as inscriptions of text, runes, or a symbol, or speaking a certain phase.

name: Noisy
desc: This item makes a loud noise when used.

name: Obsession
desc: The user of this item risks becoming obsessed with it and unwilling to part with it.

name: Possessive
desc: Once this item has an owner, it is very difficult for another to claim it. It may require its owner to relinquish it, or for the new user to kill them.

name: Sentient
desc: This item is alive and can speak to its user or others. It has some amount of control over how it is used and may be able to reject users it deems unfit.

name: Set
desc: This item is part of a set. The other item(s) in the set have similar abilities, and combining them might produce an more powerful item.

name: Symbolic
desc: This item is symbolic of holding a high position or of owning something significant, such as a lost treasure or a far-away fortress. People might mistakenly assume its user is the legitimate owner, or merely having the item might be enough to grant its user legitimate ownership.

name: Testing
desc: This item will test any potential user to determine if they are worthy of it.

name: Timepiece
desc: This item displays the current date, time, or phase of the moon, or it displays a countdown until a certain event.

name: Trap
desc: This item was secretly created to kill, capture, or manipulate its user.

name: Vengeful Creator
desc: The creator of this item wants it back or disapproves of its current user, and seeks to destroy them or steal back the item. It might learn the item's location whenever the item is used.

name: Worn
desc: This item is worn from lack of use, but will regain its power the more it is used.
